title: Bathroom Items Quiz
description: How well do you know common bathroom items and toiletries? Test your everyday knowledge!

questions.question: What bathroom item is a porous, natural sea creature skeleton used for bathing?
Which bathroom tool is a rough volcanic stone used to remove dead skin from feet?
What is the purpose of a shower caddy?
options: Organizing and holding shampoo, soap, and other shower items

questions.question: Which personal care item is a small, flat board coated with abrasive material for shaping fingernails?
What does a medicine cabinet typically store in a bathroom?
options: Over-the-counter medications, first aid items, and toiletries

questions.question: Which bathroom fixture delivers a stream of warm air for drying hands?
What is dental floss used for?
options: Removing food particles and plaque from between teeth

questions.question: Which bathroom item is a terry cloth band worn around the wrist or head to absorb sweat?
What is a loofah (luffa) actually made from?
options: The fibrous interior of a dried gourd

questions.question: Which grooming tool has a row of bristles or teeth set in a handle, used to detangle and style hair?
What is the purpose of a bath mat?
options: Providing a non-slip surface and absorbing water when stepping out of the tub

questions.question: Which item is a small, hourglass-shaped timer often kept near a toothbrush?
What bathroom product is designed to reduce body odor by inhibiting bacterial growth in the underarm area?
Which device uses heated plates to smooth and straighten hair?
What is the purpose of a toilet tank float?
options: Regulating the water level in the tank by shutting off the fill valve
